author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The glorious Summerking has unleashed his glittering host across the Mortal Realms and Workshop is releasing both a new Unique falconer Character and updated Battletome to announce his glorious works. The degenerate ghouls of the deluded Flesh Eater Courts are back with a 4th edition Battletome. Let's check it out!

Thanks to Games Workshop for the complimentary advance copy of the book to review. 

#AdWIP
#AOS4
#WarhammerCommunity

title: GMG Reviews - Death Battletome: Flesheater Courts by Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The spooky-ghosts of the Nighthaunts return with a 4th edition Battletome, a new Character unit with four arms, a liar's tongue and a bad attitude. There's even a reason to buy a Black Coach for other death armies AND a new SPEARHEAD. Let's check it out!

Thanks to Games Workshop for the complimentary advance copy of the book to review.
